Steps: Type exactly 15 characters in Player 1 input field
Expected Result: All 15 characters are accepted and displayed

Steps: Try to type the 16th character in Player 1 input
Expected Result: 16th character is blocked, input remains at 15 chars

Steps: Type 10 characters in Player 1 input
Expected Result: Character counter shows "10/15 characters"

Steps: Fill Player 1 input to maximum (15 chars)
Expected Result: Character counter shows "15/15 characters"

Steps: Paste text longer than 15 characters into Player 1 input
Expected Result: Text is truncated to 15 characters only

Steps: Type exactly 15 characters in Player 2 input field
Expected Result: All 15 characters are accepted and displayed

Steps: Try to type the 16th character in Player 2 input
Expected Result: 16th character is blocked, input remains at 15 chars

Steps: Type 8 characters in Player 2 input
Expected Result: Character counter shows "8/15 characters"

Steps: Type 10 chars, then clear Player 1 input completely
Expected Result: Character counter resets to "0/15 characters"

Steps: Type 12 chars, then clear Player 2 input completely
Expected Result: Character counter resets to "0/15 characters"

Steps: Type special characters (@#$%^&*) up to 15 chars in Player 1
Expected Result: Special characters are accepted within limit

Steps: Type mix of numbers and letters (Player123abc) in Player 2
Expected Result: Mixed alphanumeric input accepted within limit

Steps: Type "Player One" (with space) in Player 1 input
Expected Result: Spaces count toward character limit, accepted

Steps: Fill both inputs with 15 chars each and submit
Expected Result: Form submits successfully with full-length names

Steps: Enter same 15-char name in both Player 1 and Player 2
Expected Result: Duplicate name error toast appears, submission blocked

Steps: Enter 15 characters in both inputs
Expected Result: UI layout remains responsive, no overflow issues

Steps: Check character counter placement for both inputs
Expected Result: Counters appear on right side, properly aligned

Steps: Type very quickly trying to exceed 15 character limit
Expected Result: Limit enforced even with rapid typing

Steps: Type 15 chars, then backspace and type again
Expected Result: Counter updates correctly, can type again

Steps: Enter names and close modal, then reopen
Expected Result: Previously entered names and counters persist
